overview: Bill Bailey is the star athlete of his school, with plenty of medals and trophies. When Gina asked him out for the big dance...he scoffs at her and reminds her how popular he is and will only go to the dance with Samantha, the popular blonde cheerleader. Gina doesn't take no for an answer...and shows Bill why she is the best choice for him with her own medal worthy skills! James is in detention because of his ex girlfriend Goldie. She feels bad and goes to apologize, which turns into a sexy romp right inside the detention hall! Sara decides to help Manuel out after class to get some extra credit. Sara confesses to him that she loves a good spanking, and it doesn’t take long for her to earn one. Alina is a confident student who always gets what she wants. In this case, it’s a hot romp at school with her professor and she makes sure she gets satisfied.
title: After School Sluts
